#summary Detailed File Format for test cases in the JSON format

= JSON Object format =

== Simple Types ==
 * int, long, short, byte -> java.lang.Integer (if possible)
 * float, double -> java.lang.Double

== Test Format ==
Unit tests
{{{
Object
    ("only") : [ "testCaseName", ... ],
    ("skip") : Boolean,
    "unitTest" : Array[
        ("skip") : Boolean
    ]
}}}
